channel.title: I need help on making portals work 317
channel.description:
ok i have a portal that i added
all i need to do is get it to teleport you to different spots
like a skilling area, training area, dragons
so like when you click on it it gives you like 4 options to pick from
can anyone help me with the codes
i need to know what to add and where to add it to
